price: Luuxiin yeroo inni ummata isaatiin jedhe “sila odoo argitanii gocha fokkataa hojjattuu?” [yaadadhu].
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata wa-antum tub'ṣirūna
